common.Message

    Package Description
    controllers  

    • Uses of Message in controllers

      Methods in controllers that return Message 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Message ManagerController.CustomerOrders()
      The function create 3 lists: customers name, books name, id.
      static Message DatabaseManagementController.GetBookDetails(int bid)
      Return a message to client containing all information about a certain book
      static Message InspectReviewController.InspectReviews()
      The function find out a list BookReview for all awaiting approval review (_approved == 0)
      static Message ManagerController.ManageCatalog()
      The function find out a list Book for all the books that appear in the catalog (_viewStatus == 1) and their author
      Methods in controllers with parameters of type Message 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void DatabaseManagementController.AddBookAssociation(Message msg)
      Add a book association such as book-author(0), book-subject(1), book-keyword(2).
      static void DatabaseManagementController.AddSubjectDomain(Message msg)
      Add a new subject(0) or domain(1) to the DB
      static boolean DatabaseManagementController.DeleteItem(Message msg)
      Delete either a book(0), subject(1) or domain(2) and all associations from DB, if possible
      static void DatabaseManagementController.EditSubjectDomain(Message msg)
      Edit subject(0) or domain(1) fields
      static void DatabaseManagementController.RemoveBookAssociation(Message msg)
      Remove a book association such as book-author(0), book-subject(1), book-keyword(2).
